s: I own a large RecTeq smoker (dual rear hoppers capable of holding 40 lbs of pellets) and added on the side box. As such, it is a large area to fill with smoke and when I use it, I want to insure I am using a pellet that burns slow and does not become ash quickly as it is expensive to run. These pellets have been the best I have found after using Traeger and many other brands...

s: The bull horn handles are a nice touch and kind of a branding style, and for a deck top grill they would be great. I haven't deducted any stars for these things, I knew what I was getting when I ordered it, but I do think RecteqÂ ...
